resources.string: Enter the rental property\'s address below. The address is used to label each property, and to make it easier to log trips
"Next we'd like some basic information about the property. If you input the Purchase Price then we can calculate you Property's Cash on Cash Invested % correctly"
"If excluded, this property won't be included in the main dashboard's financial totals and charts"

If your property has a mortgage, then inputting its mortgage terms enables RentPal to automatically set the principal, interest, and escrow amounts when you log mortgage payment transactions. If you made extra principal payments, then logging them as mortgage principal transactions will update the amortizations schedule"
